item.title: If Wokeism Dies, What Cause Will the Left Embrace Next?
When a Harvard MBA No Longer Guarantees a Job, Seek a Different Sort of Education
item.description: Perhaps the purpose of higher education, at least initially, shouldn’t be to pass on a fixed set of job skills, but to form the intellect.

item.title: Rise of the Romantasy
item.description: Young adults are reading more because they’re reading books that are easy to love.

item.title: Stand Athwart the Progressive Leviathan
item.description: Hostility to the excesses of the federal government is a possible source of consensus on the right.

item.title: Pro-Life Means Pro-Baby and Pro-Mother, in Tennessee and Elsewhere
